an7.51:1.3: katamo ca so, bhikkhave, samyogo visamyogo dhammapariyayo?
an7.51:2.1: Itthi, bhikkhave, ajjhattam itthindriyam manasi karoti—
an7.51:2.2: itthikuttam itthakappam itthividham itthicchandam itthissaram itthalankaram.
an7.51:2.4: Sa tattha ratta tatrabhirata bahiddha purisindriyam manasi karoti—
an7.51:2.5: purisakuttam purisakappam purisavidham purisacchandam purisassaram purisalankaram.
an7.51:2.7: Sa tattha ratta tatrabhirata bahiddha samyogam akankhati.
an7.51:2.8: Yancassa samyogapaccaya uppajjati sukham somanassam tanca akankhati.
an7.51:2.9: Itthatte, bhikkhave, abhirata satta purisesu samyogam gata.
an7.51:2.10: Evam kho, bhikkhave, itthi itthattam nativattati.
an7.51:3.1: Puriso, bhikkhave, ajjhattam purisindriyam manasi karoti—
an7.51:3.2: purisakuttam purisakappam purisavidham purisacchandam purisassaram purisalankaram.
an7.51:3.4: So tattha ratto tatrabhirato bahiddha itthindriyam manasi karoti—
an7.51:3.5: itthikuttam itthakappam itthividham itthicchandam itthissaram itthalankaram.
an7.51:3.7: So tattha ratto tatrabhirato bahiddha samyogam akankhati.
an7.51:3.8: Yancassa samyogapaccaya uppajjati sukham somanassam tanca akankhati.
an7.51:3.9: Purisatte, bhikkhave, abhirata satta itthisu samyogam gata.
an7.51:3.10: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puriso purisattam nativattati.
an7.51:4.2: Itthi, bhikkhave, ajjhattam itthindriyam na manasi karoti—
an7.51:4.3: itthikuttam itthakappam itthividham itthicchandam itthissaram itthalankaram.
an7.51:4.4: Sa tattha na rajjati, sa tatra nabhiramati.
an7.51:4.5: Sa tattha aratta tatra anabhirata bahiddha purisindriyam na manasi karoti—
an7.51:4.6: purisakuttam purisakappam purisavidham purisacchandam purisassaram purisalankaram.
an7.51:4.7: Sa tattha na rajjati, tatra nabhiramati.
an7.51:4.8: Sa tattha aratta tatra anabhirata bahiddha samyogam nakankhati.
an7.51:4.9: Yancassa samyogapaccaya uppajjati sukham somanassam tanca nakankhati.
an7.51:4.10: Itthatte, bhikkhave, anabhirata satta purisesu visamyogam gata.
an7.51:4.11: Evam kho, bhikkhave, itthi itthattam ativattati.
an7.51:5.1: Puriso, bhikkhave, ajjhattam purisindriyam na manasi karoti—
an7.51:5.2: purisakuttam purisakappam purisavidham purisacchandam purisassaram purisalankaram.
an7.51:5.3: So tattha na rajjati, so tatra nabhiramati.
an7.51:5.4: So tattha aratto tatra anabhirato bahiddha itthindriyam na manasi karoti—
an7.51:5.5: itthikuttam itthakappam itthividham itthicchandam itthissaram itthalankaram.
an7.51:5.6: So tattha na rajjati, tatra nabhiramati.
an7.51:5.7: So tattha aratto tatra anabhirato bahiddha samyogam nakankhati.
an7.51:5.8: Yancassa samyogapaccaya uppajjati sukham somanassam tanca nakankhati.
an7.51:5.9: Purisatte, bhikkhave, anabhirata satta itthisu visamyogam gata.
an7.51:5.10: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puriso purisattam ativattati.
an7.51:5.12: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, samyogo visamyogo dhammapariyayo”ti.
